contents.text: Charnel Compactor
Test article text. There is lots of thext. Loriem ipsum sit dolor foobar blah blah
Introduction
We thank you for choosing solutions from NEEP.
Crafting and processing recipes are not yet supported in this guide. To view them, you must install REI.
Mixer
The Mixer is a two block tall machine that combines fluids and items. It requires a source of rotation to function.
Usage

Fluid inputs are taken from any tank that is adjacent to the mixer's lower block. Item inputs must be inserted directly into the machine through hoppers or pipes. Once a valid combination of items and fluids is present, the mixing will begin. The rate of this process is determined by the speed of the connected motor.
Gland Potato

The Gland Potato is the simplest example of an Enlightened organism. Exposure to the Divine has caused it to take on exotic fleshy characteristics, perhaps echoing Its nature. The tissues bear novel organic products that can be refined with a Mixer.
Whisper Wheat
Many who cultivate it report hearing terrifying cosmic secrets in the rustling of its sheaves.
Blood Bubble Tree
Granting Enlightenment to a Warped Fungus remakes its flesh. Instead of fruit, the tree bears membranous sacs filled with animal blood.
Eldritch Enzymes
This product of the Gland Potato has many exotic properties and is well suited for mineral extraction.
Production
Blending a gland potato in 333mb of water with a mixer will produce 333mb of Eldritch Enzymes.
Trommel
The trommel is used to purify ethereal fats for higher yields. Solid impurities remain inside the rotating mesh while the fluent fat drains away.
Usage
Fluid inputs are inserted into the top of the nearest block and outputs leave through
Rendering Basin
The enlightened enzymes of the Gland Potato concentrate the fleshly nature of certain minerals into a layer of ethereal fat. Thus, an important element of mineral extraction is the Rendering Basin.
Usage

To obtain ore fat, fill a Rendering Basin with eldritch enzymes and drop in raw ore from above. The ore fat will appear within an adjacent Fat Collector from which it can be extracted. Each unit of raw ore requires 333mb of Eldritch Enzymes to process.
Fat Collector
Fat collectors draw ethereal fats from adjacent Rendering Basins into their reservoirs.
Usage

A Fat Collector must be placed with its arm facing a Rendering Basin. Provided enough Eldritch Enzymes are present in the basin, inserting any raw ore will produce its corresponding fat in the collector. Up to four Fat Collectors can be placed next to a single Rendering Basin to collect the fats from different ores.
Heart Extraction
Blood
Blood is an important precursor for many industrial processes.
[note: Blood can't be automated yet and there aren't that many uses for it.
Acquisition

Blood can be obtained by killing a living entity with a Sacrificial Dagger above a Drain. Alternatively, the fruit of the Blood Bubble tree can be pressed into a bucket or blended in a Mixer to obtain fresh blood.
Meat
As well as a being a nourishing food, purest meat is the precursor to Meat Steel.
Acquisition
Crushing any item of impure meat in a Grinder will produce 1-2 meat scraps. Nine of these can be crafted into a Raw Meat Brick.

Meat in its liquid form comes from macerating living entities with the Death Blades. When supplied with a source of rotation, the Death Blades will damage nearby entities. If an entity is killed above a drain, a small amount of meat will be collected. Liquid meat can be converted into solid bricks using a Hydraulic Press.
Integrator Organism

An Integrator is a biomechanical information processing system intended to ease the production of machines. Designed to withstand high quantities of inhuman knowledge, Integrators can confer this information to certain substances, ascending them to Enlightened forms.
Acquisition

The technology to produce Integrators is long-lost, but their eggs can still be found in dungeons. To hatch an Integrator Egg, place it in a comfy place and pump in a bucketfull of blood. After a short time, the Integrator will hatch.
Usage
Each Integrator has an internal reservoir of Enlightenment that is gradually filled as it listens to the cosmos. Feeding the organism with Whisper Flour will quickly fill this reservoir.
Enlightening
Enlightenment brings about great changes in objects that can withstand it. Many organisms exist whose Enlightened forms have industrial applications.
Usage

To enlighten an item, place it in a Pedestal that is connected via data cables to a mature Integrator. If the item is valid, the Integrator will manifest a cosmic beam that confers eldritch wisdom to the item. This process takes approximately 12% of the Integrator's stored Enlightenment.
Charnel Compactor

The Charnel Compactor produces Body Compound from raw meat. This coming together of diverse tissues is a sacrament. With the blessing of Enlightenment, dead organs can be half-imbued with life and can go on to create all manner of new machines.
Usage

Like a composter, raw materials can be inserted by right-clicking or through hoppers and pipes into the top of the block. If the compactor is full and connected to an Integrator via Data Cables, a Body Compound Cartridge will be produced. This can be extracted via hoppers and pipes from the block's bottom face.
